title: WTB: Any blank backs T227 or T212 cards
author: wayne97

posts.post_title: WTB: Any blank backs T227 or T212 cards
posts.post_content:
Looking for any t212 or t227 Blank back cards

thank you for looking
I have seen blank back T212s but not T227s? Have you seen any, Wayne?
Leon, I do recall seeing some blank backed T227, just can't remember where I saw them.  I'll try to see if I can figure out where they were.
There are some T227s, but they aren't blank backed cards, they are poster/ad cuts. Here is one I used to own.
I've only seen a single Baker, Bender and Marquard...ever.  I believe all 3 are in GAI or BVG holders.  Baker and Bender are with me....not sure where Marquard ended up.

Hey Fellas,

have a Marquard here... unfortunately NFS!

Snagged in at the National last summer...

Sorry for the glare in the pic.

TTYL!

Cliff
